plot: This Doc films three boys over the span of ten years. These children are part of the thousands of "Manhole Children" in Mongolia, children who have been abandoned and are forced to live in the steam pipes underneath the cities.
title: Manhole Children
plot_es: This Doc films three boys over the span of ten years. These children are part of the thousands of "Manhole Children" in Mongolia, children who have been abandoned and are forced to live in the steam pipes underneath the cities.
plot_en: This Doc films three boys over the span of ten years. These children are part of the thousands of "Manhole Children" in Mongolia, children who have been abandoned and are forced to live in the steam pipes underneath the cities.
